database

Class Database

  • java.lang.Object
    • database.Database

  • public class Database
extends java.lang.Object
    Database.java has methods to set up a connection with the database and handle SQL queries.
    Version:
    1.48 (15.03.15)
    Author:
    Copyright (c) 2015 EyeHouse Ltd. All rights reserved.

      • getUser

        public static User getUser(java.lang.String username)
        To be used if the user has been confirmed to exist in the login stage if they do exist then the username and password is correct this gets all the users details and stores them in an object This method is currently superfluous (while loginCheck does the same thing)
        Returns:
        The users details in an instance of User

      • likeReview

        public static boolean likeReview(User userDetails,
                 HouseReview houseReview,
                 UserReview userReview,
                 int type)
        Like review. If the user has already liked the review delete the like record and switch status to no like or dislike. If the user has disliked the review switch the record to like. If the user has not liked or disliked the review insert a like record.
        Parameters:
        userDetails -
        houseReview -
        userReview -
        type -
        Returns:
        True on success

      • dislikeReview

        public static boolean dislikeReview(User userDetails,
                    HouseReview houseReview,
                    UserReview userReview,
                    int type)
        Dislike review. If review already disliked delete record. If liked switch to disliked. If no like or dislike create dislike record.
        Parameters:
        userDetails -
        houseReview -
        userReview -
        type -
        Returns:
        True on success
